# ISingleStoreConnectorLoggerProvider interface

Implementations of [`ISingleStoreConnectorLoggerProvider`](./ISingleStoreConnectorLoggerProvider.md) create logger instances.

```csharp
public interface ISingleStoreConnectorLoggerProvider
```

## Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| [CreateLogger](ISingleStoreConnectorLoggerProvider/CreateLogger.md)(…) | Creates a logger with the specified name. This method may be called from multiple threads and must be thread-safe. |
